name: mkdir
shortDescription: make directories

name: rmdir
shortDescription: remove empty directories

name: ls
shortDescription: list directory contents

name: cat
shortDescription: concatenate files and print on the standard output

name: mv
shortDescription: move (rename) files

name: touch
shortDescription: change file timestamps

name: cp
shortDescription: copy files and directories

name: rm
shortDescription: remove files or directories

name: grep
shortDescription: print lines matching a pattern

name: wc
shortDescription: print newline, word, and byte counts for each file

name: pwd
shortDescription: print name of current/working directory

name: who
shortDescription: show who is logged on

name: kill
shortDescription: send a signal to a process

name: date
shortDescription: print or set the system date and time

name: chown
shortDescription: change file owner and group

name: base32
shortDescription: base32 encode/decode data and print to standard output

name: base64
shortDescription: base64 encode/decode data and print to standard output

name: cksum
shortDescription: checksum and count the bytes in a file

name: comm
shortDescription: compare two sorted files line by line

name: chcon
shortDescription: change file security context

name: chgrp
shortDescription: change group ownership

name: csplit
shortDescription: split a file into sections determined by context lines

name: cut
shortDescription: remove sections from each line of files

name: dd
shortDescription: convert and copy a file

name: df
shortDescription: report file system disk space usage

name: dircolors
shortDescription: color setup for ls

name: dirname
shortDescription: strip last component from file name

name: du
shortDescription: estimate file space usage

name: env
shortDescription: run a program in a modified environment

name: expr
shortDescription: evaluate expressions

name: factor
shortDescription: factor numbers

name: file
shortDescription: determine file type

name: flock
shortDescription: manage locks from shell scripts

name: free
shortDescription: Display amount of free and used memory in the system

name: hostid
shortDescription: print the numeric identifier for the current host

name: install
shortDescription: copy files and set attributes

name: id
shortDescription: print real and effective user and group IDs

name: join
shortDescription: join lines of two files on a common field

name: link
shortDescription: call the link function to create a link to a file

name: ln
shortDescription: make links between files

name: logger
shortDescription: enter messages into the system log

name: logname
shortDescription: print user's login name

name: md5sum
shortDescription: compute and check MD5 message digest

name: mkfifo
shortDescription: make FIFOs (named pipes)

name: mknod
shortDescription: make block or character special files

name: mktemp
shortDescription: create a temporary file or directory

name: nice
shortDescription: run a program with modified scheduling priority

name: nl
shortDescription: number lines of files

name: nohup
shortDescription: run a command immune to hangups, with output to a non-tty

name: nproc
shortDescription: print the number of processing units available

name: numfmt
shortDescription: Convert numbers from/to human-readable strings

name: od
shortDescription: dump files in octal and other formats

name: paste
shortDescription: merge lines of files

name: pathchk
shortDescription: check whether file names are valid or portable

name: pinky
shortDescription: lightweight finger

name: printenv
shortDescription: print all or part of environment

name: ptx
shortDescription: produce a permuted index of file contents

name: pwd
shortDescription: print name of current/working directory

name: readlink
shortDescription: print resolved symbolic links or canonical file names

name: realpath
shortDescription: print the resolved path

name: runcon
shortDescription: run command with specified security context

name: seq
shortDescription: print a sequence of numbers

name: shuf
shortDescription: generate random permutations

name: sleep
shortDescription: delay for a specified amount of time

name: sort
shortDescription: sort lines of text files

name: stat
shortDescription: display file or file system status

name: stdbuf
shortDescription: Run COMMAND, with modified buffering operations for its standard streams.

name: stty
shortDescription: change and print terminal line settings

name: sum
shortDescription: checksum and count the blocks in a file

name: sync
shortDescription: Synchronize cached writes to persistent storage

name: tac
shortDescription: concatenate and print files in reverse

name: tail
shortDescription: output the last part of files

name: timeout
shortDescription: run a command with a time limit

name: tr
shortDescription: translate or delete characters

name: truncate
shortDescription: shrink or extend the size of a file to the specified size

name: tsort
shortDescription: perform topological sort

name: tty
shortDescription: print the file name of the terminal connected to standard input

name: uname
shortDescription: print system information

name: unlink
shortDescription: call the unlink function to remove the specified file

name: uptime
shortDescription: Tell how long the system has been running.

name: users
shortDescription: print the user names of users currently logged in to the current host

name: pstree
shortDescription: display a tree of processes
